bb90d8a1-8d68-5752-8319-26970e82e1d3.title: Provide a minimum cover for the steel reinforcement in accordance with TfNSW R53, unless shown otherwise in the Drawings. For slab of thickness 120 mm and greater, fix the steel mesh within the top half of the slab. For slabs of thickness less than 120 mm, fix the steel mesh at the mid-depth of the slab.
